        """In my anime theme world, this means I want to fly. I will fly. I am flying.
            More than 25 years ago, Son Goku of Dragon Balls Z taught me that through training, experience, 
            persistence and dedication, I can achieve my goals. And I will do just that! I plan to pick up techniques

        for _ in range(4):
            print("Study. Code. Debug. Repeat.")

        main()
